text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
The Turbo chant! When Turbo wins, I want 
everyone to chant my name just like King's!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Call out your own name, repeatedly, 
triumphantly, and fans will follow along…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
With the exceptional chant of a first-class 
horsegirl, an even greater group of fans 
is sure to follow♪

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Fans, eh? You don't really need 
to show 'em how.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Just tell 'em, "Shut up and follow me…". 
Ain't that enough?They'll get behind you 
if they wanna.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I wanna try, I wanna try! 
…Shut up, and just follow Turbo!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, not bad at all. 
…Quiet down, and follow my lead!
